The AK-47, officially known as the Avtomat Kalashnikova (Russian: Автома́т Кала́шникова, lit. ‘Kalashnikov’s automatic rifle’; also known as the Kalashnikov or just AK), is a gas-operated, 7.62×39mm assault rifle developed in the Soviet Union by Mikhail Kalashnikov in the aftermath of World War II. It is the originating firearm of the Kalashnikov rifle (or “AK”) family. The number 47 refers to the year it was finished.

name: RPG-7D Several Sizes of Overcaliber Rockets
summary: RPG-7D Several Sizes of Overcaliber Rockets 6.3 kg 650mm/950mm
description:
Powerful. Cheap. Simple. Robust. The RPG-7 is the most famous anti-tank rocket launcher since its introduction in 1961, with over 9 million units produced. Serving in more than 40 countries, it is favored by irregular military groups. The RPG-7, or Ruchnoy Protivotankovvy Granatomyot, is an advancement of the 1949 RPG-2, offering improved range and armor penetration.

The RPG-7 is a reusable, single-shot, smoothbore steel tube with a 40mm diameter. It is recoilless, shoulder-fired, and muzzle-loaded, capable of shooting a variety of rockets. It includes optical and iron sights, with night vision as an option. The barrel is covered in wood to protect the operator from heat, with two handles close together in the center.

This versatile weapon can fire inside buildings due to its small back-blast. It gives off a noticeable flash, noise, and smoke. After 10 meters, the rocket’s motor ignites, and four fins fold out, reaching a maximum velocity of 300 m/s. Operated by a gunner and an assistant, it has a maximum range of 920 meters and an effective range of about 200 meters.

Used for nearly 60 years, the RPG-7 has knocked out tanks, destroyed armored vehicles, buildings, fortifications, attacked infantry, and downed helicopters. Insurgents also use it on small boats armed with RPG-7s and machine guns. Rockets include:

- PG-7V: 85mm HEAT, penetrates 260mm armor.
- PG-7VM: 70mm HEAT, penetrates 300mm armor, faster and more accurate.
- PG-7VS: 73mm HEAT, penetrates 400mm armor.
- PG-7VS1: Cheaper, penetrates 360mm armor.
- PG-7VL: 93mm HEAT, penetrates 500mm armor.
- PG-7VR: 105mm tandem HEAT, penetrates 600mm steel armor with ERA.
- OG-7V: 40mm HE-FRAG, large lethal radius.
- TBG-7V: 105mm thermobaric, devastating effect.

Produced in Iraq, Romania, China, and Bulgaria, the RPG-7 remains in use despite being phased out by many militaries for modern anti-armor roles.

name: Hacking course
summary: 3 in 1 hacker courses with all materials and labs to download.
description:
BEGINNER HACKING COURSE

Hacking courses for beginners teach the basics of ethical and black hacking, including the tools, techniques, and methodologies used to identify and exploit vulnerabilities in computer systems. Topics include network scanning, vulnerability assessment, password cracking, and social engineering. These courses aim to provide a solid foundation in ethical and black hacking, equipping students with the skills to identify and mitigate security risks or act as crackers. Hands-on experience is provided through practical exercises and simulations.

INTERMEDIATE HACKING COURSE

Intermediate hacking courses delve deeper into areas such as network and web application penetration testing, advanced exploit techniques, and malware analysis. Students learn to use advanced tools, perform in-depth vulnerability assessments, and develop custom exploits. Practical labs and real-world scenarios help solidify skills and knowledge.

ADVANCED HACKING COURSE

Advanced hacking courses cover sophisticated techniques and methodologies used by experienced hackers and security professionals. Topics include advanced exploitation techniques, reverse engineering, exploit development, and advanced persistent threats (APTs). These courses focus on real-world scenarios and cutting-edge technologies to prepare students for high-level security roles or to enhance their hacking skills further.

name: C++ course with labs
summary: Full C++ course with labs for practice.
description:
A comprehensive C++ course with practical labs covering various aspects of the programming language. This course is designed for individuals who want to learn C++ from scratch or enhance their existing knowledge. It includes:

1. Basics of C++ programming
2. Object-oriented programming principles
3. Advanced topics such as templates, exception handling, and file I/O
4. Hands-on labs and projects to apply the concepts learned
5. Best practices and coding standards
6. Real-world examples and case studies

By the end of the course, participants will have a solid understanding of C++ programming and the ability to develop and maintain C++ applications effectively.

name: High Power Portable GPS
summary: High Power Portable GPS (GPS L1,L2,L3,L4,L5) Jammer
description:
High Power Portable GPS (GPS L1,L2,L3,L4,L5) Jammer

Product Description:
Are you sick of being tracked like a criminal? This GPS jammer can solve your troubles by prohibiting signals from tracking your location, ensuring your privacy. The high power portable GPS (GPS L1/L2/L3/L4/L5) jammer is designed for this purpose.

The device can work while being charged, and each band can work separately or simultaneously. With up to 2.5 Watt power, the device is powerful and portable. It features an internal rechargeable battery with low power consumption, allowing it to work continuously for more than 1 hour. The battery is easily charged with a pocket charger, creating a shielded area with a radius of 2 to 15 meters.

The jammer comes with an AC adapter and car charger for recharging. It is useful for blocking GPS signals, providing security, and preventing tracking. The sky-blue color adds to its appeal.

At a glance:
- Charging while working
- Each band can work separately or simultaneously
- Built-in fans and wind slots on two sides with internal coolers for constant cooling

Technical Specifications:
- GPSL1: 1500-1600MHz
- GPSL2: 1220-1230MHz
- GPSL3: 1200-1210MHz
- GPSL4: 1250-1280MHz
- GPSL5: 1170-1180MHz
- Power supply: AC110-240V / DC12V
- Built-in Battery: 1800mA/h
- Total output power: Up to 2.5Watt
- Radius range: 2-15m (depending on the mobile service provider’s network condition)
- Built-in battery time: 1 hour
- Signal source: Synthesized operation
- Working temperature: -10 ~ +50 degrees centigrade
- Relative Humidity: 5%-80%
- Color: Sky-blue
- Device size: 113*60*31mm
- Net weight: 0.275KG

Accessories:
- Handheld GPS jammer x1
- Power adaptor x1
- Car adaptor x1
- Antennas x4
- Carry Case x1
